item.title: Goals, Strengths and Weaknesses
item.description:
Goals, Strengths and Weaknesses

Jellybean Games has a mission statement: to make kid-friendly games that grown-ups will love.

item.title: Writing a Mission Statement
item.description:
Writing a Mission Statement

When I first came up with Jellybean Games, it seemed pretty simple. Make good games that I was proud of, release them on Kickstarter. Repeat?

item.title: About Jellybean Games
item.description:
About Jellybean Games

In July of this year I was trying to convince Christopher Badell (designer of Sentinels of the Multiverse, Deck Building the Deck Building Gameand co-designer of Hex Mex - more on that later) that Greater Than Games should buy the rights to Story War.

item.title: About me.
item.description:
About me.

My name is Peter C. Hayward. I'm a 28-year old Australian with blue hair, a blue beard, and a dream.
